aspect: 1. Young accountant Jacob Phillips died after plunging 70ft down a cliff when he ran from a cab, not wanting to pay the fare.
2. Phillips had been out drinking in Cardiff before catching a taxi, leaving him and his friends without enough money for the fare.
3. Inquest hears Phillips became disoriented and did not know the danger he was in, ultimately leading to his accidental death.
explain: Jacob Phillips, a young accountant, died in a tragic incident where he fell 70ft down a cliff after running away from a cab in Cardiff due to non-payment of fare.

Jacob Phillips had been out drinking excessively in Cardiff, after which he was not able to afford the taxi fare with his friends, ultimately resulting in a 70ft cliff fall incident, which led to his untimely death.
Phillips, who was lost and unaware of the risks, inadvertently fell from a cliff, resulting in his tragic death.
